treatment-md.title: Otostigmus demelloi Verhoeff 1937
treatment-md.article-title: The centipede genus Otostigmus Porat in Brazil: Description of three new species from the Atlantic Forest; a summary and an identification key to the Brazilian species of this genus (Chilopoda, Scolopendromorpha, Scolopendridae, Otostigminae)
